Judul: INVESTMENT FEASIBILITY ANALYSIS OF REST AREA KM 236 AT PEJAGEN - KANCI TOLL ROAD
Abstrak: The systematic methodology that will be used in this research paper in order to solve the problems is consisted of five systematical steps. Those steps are preliminary observation, literature review, data gathering and calculation, analysis the data, and make conclusion and suggestion. The object of this research paper is the property company called PT X. The theories in this research paper will be used Cash Flow, Minimum Attractive Rate of Return (MARR), Net Present Value (NPV) method, Internal Rate of Return (IRR) method,Payback Period (PP) method, Modified Interest Rate of Return (MIRR)
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir. Drs. Arson Aliludin, SE, DEA.
Kata Kunci: economical feasibility analysis, Net Present Value, IRR, PP, MIRR
